item.title: About This Site
item.description: This site was put together to host some non-English translations of a Community Pages published in PLoS Biology: https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pbio.3001843. Currently, the piece has been translated into the following languages: Spanish Portugese Russian Traditional Chinese Swahili Italian French Polish Nepali Japanese Dutch Sinhalese Romanian Contribute If you see a language not on this list but would like to contribute, please email Corey Callaghan (callaghan.corey.t@gmail.com), or create a pull request. Last updated: Sept 2022
